SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core

Class YaegerGameObject

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.core.YaegerGameObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Effectable
Direct Known Subclasses:
StaticScene, YaegerEntity
public abstract class YaegerGameObject extends Object implements Effectable
The abstract base class of both the YaegerEntity and StaticScene and contains the shared behaviour.

            Min: -1.0 Completely dark
      Max: +1.0 Fully bright
